mapper.select: select ru.R_id, ru.R_name,ru.R_Address,ru.R_card,ru.R_cash,b.borrow,r.renting,ru.R_stat from rent_users ru, (select nvl(count(roi.ROI_BUYIDNUM),'0') borrow, ru.R_idnum as bnum from rent_users ru, rent_orders_items roi where roi.ROI_BUYIDNUM(+) = ru.R_IDNUM group by ru.R_IDNUM) b, (select nvl(count(rp.RP_usernum),'0') renting, ru.R_idnum as brnum from rent_users ru, rent_products rp where ru.R_IDNUM = rp.rp_usernum(+) group by ru.R_idnum) r where b.bnum = r.brnum and r.brnum = ru.R_idnum and ru.R_stat != 'admin' order by R_name desc
select roi.roi_buyidnum from RENT_ORDERS_ITEMS roi,RENT_PRODUCTS rp where roi.ROI_ITEMNUM=rp.RP_ITEMNUM and round((sysdate - roi.ROI_ENDDATE),0) > 30 order by roi.ROI_ENDDATE

select * from (select count(*) count_products from rent_products) cp, (select count(*) count_borrow from rent_orders_items where sysdate - roi_enddate < 0) cb, (select count(*) count_success from rent_orders_items where roi_stat = '거래 완료') cs, (select count(*) count_delay from rent_orders_items where sysdate - roi_enddate > 0 and roi_stat = '대여중') cd
select rp_itemname, rp_regdate, rp_guarantee from rent_products where RP_GUARANTEE != 'on' and RP_GUARANTEE != '0'
mapper.update: update rent_users set r_stat = 'block' where r_idnum = #{R_idnum}
update rent_orders_items set roi_enddate = sysdate where roi_buyidnum=#{R_idnum} and roi_itemnum = #{RP_itemnum}
update rent_users set R_stat = 'normal' , R_cash = -#{invalid_price} where R_idnum = #{R_idnum}
